name: Anomatronics
description:
Anomatronics is a 3D first person shooter playable in solo or in internet multiplayer. It was made with the Unity3d game engine.

The goal is to fight against the robot ennemies who come by waves. At start you only got one handgun with few ammos, but by damaging enemies you will earn money with which you can buy more ammos and amazing weapon (such as shotgun, minigun, sniper or rocket launcher !) in a special safe zone randomly moving during the game. This safe zone is delimited by green particules and enemies can’t go inside.

How many waves will you defeat ? We hope you will enjoy playing our game, and have fun !
